title: Reindeer hat

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Reindeer hat is an untradeable cosmetic item obtained by completing one of the Christmas holiday events that occur once per year. This also rewards the player with all other holiday items associated with Christmas.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Reindeer hat
Reindeer hat

Item ID10507

The Reindeer hat is an untradeable cosmetic item obtained by completing one of the Christmas holiday events that occur once per year. This also rewards the player with all other holiday items associated with Christmas.

A player prancing with the Reindeer hat.

Before the 2013 Christmas event, reindeer hats and bunny ears spawned in two out of 100 random locations in every world between 14 and 21 July 2013. When picked up by a player, it would immediately spawn in another location.

This item can be stored in the toy box space of a costume room.

An emote is performed by using the "prance" option on the hat while it is worn. This usually spawns a snow pile under the player, which can be picked from, and melts soon after. In snow-restricted areas, the message in the chatbox will instead state: This is not an appropriate place to play with your hat!

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

The option to spawn snow on the ground was renamed from operate to prance.

17 December 2013
(update)

The reindeer hat now has a chance of spawning snow on the ground when you perform its emote, provided you're in a suitable place and there isn't already lots of snow present.

[[File:Reindeer hat detail.png|left|150px]]
[[File:Reindeer hat chathead.png|left]]
The '''Reindeer hat''' is an untradeable cosmetic item obtained by completing one of the [[Christmas event|Christmas]] [[holiday events]] that occur once per year. This also rewards the player with all other holiday items associated with Christmas.
[[File:Reindeer hat emote.gif|frame|left|A player prancing with the Reindeer hat.]]
Before the [[2013 Christmas event]], reindeer hats and [[bunny ears]] spawned in two out of 100 random locations in every world between 14 and [[21 July]] [[2013]]. When picked up by a player, it would immediately spawn in another location.

{{Costume storage|toy box space}}

An [[emote]] is performed by using the "prance" option on the hat while it is worn. This usually spawns a snow pile under the player, which can be [[snowball|picked from]], and melts soon after. In [[Snow#Restricted areas|snow-restricted]] areas, the message in the chatbox will instead state: <q>This is not an appropriate place to play with your hat!</q>
